Text:
Not to be picky, but you may want to know as an archivist - David Boring, according to the copyright page, was published in 2000.

Again, only mentioned in case you care about such things (I do, annoyingly).

Thanks again for all your efforts.  Haven't yet read this Clowes fellow, but looking forward to it.

Oh wow! I think it would be pretty awesome to have not read Daniel Clowes yet, just so I could experience it new all over again. He's good stuff.

Yeah, I should always double check the actual books I'm uploading for that information, but truthfully, I don't. I often go by what Amazon, Wikipedia or the comicbookdb tells me, because it's quicker to work from websites than to constantly be opening all the cbr/cbz files. Amazon says 2002 on this one, so we'll blame them.
